function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Risk of biased results due to two-step modeling approach","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of misinterpreting categorical subjective interpretation, potentially leading to inconsistent coding and scoring.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliability of the flourishing scale and ess data may be
